archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0984
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Billing Specialist, I require the ability to choose to send information only statements for non-billable child accounts

properties.value: For whom statement should be available, for customers?, what should be the form of a statement -paper of electronic? maybe its just a notifcation? To be discussed on customer hierarchy workshop. Comarch will need information about document template, what information should be presented, sample document. VFNZ: Please deliver customer account statement template + sample

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
